contents: Items: Improved load performance of item lists.
Items: Shops from which an item can be purchased are now displayed.
Items: Visual overhaul for item lists (can be toggled between the old, more compact layout and the new, more detailed layout) and added filters and sort options.
Items: Rearranged items into three tabs (Items, Furniture and Equipment) and added information for Consumable and Collectible type items.
Crafting: Visual overhaul to match the other pages.

Crafting: Corrected crafting nodes for Global server. (Note: the probability for 2nd Node items shown assume that the 2nd Node is chosen, this is not guaranteed for common grade nodes. i.e. you may get an item from either the 1st or 2nd Node)
Improved the Search Bar to show more results and now searches Craft Nodes and Event Stages. Stages can now be searched for by name, area, stage type or event name.
Recollection Lobbies and Furniture Interactions will no longer display if it has not been implemented yet on the selected Game Server.
Changing Game Server or Language is now instant without a page reload.
Various Translation updates and fixes.
Students: Added information for Kazusa and Moe.
Stages: Added information for "Sweet Secrets and Gun Fights" Event Stages.
Students: Added tooltips to show calculated DMG reduction from DEF, Crit Chance and Stability Minimum DMG on student stat tables.
Items: Corrected drop chances from bounty stages on Artifact pages. (Probability shown is the chance of obtaining at least one item)
Translation updates.
Items: Show drop stages for which the item can drop through an item box.
Localization Update: Added and updated various translations including Raid skills in all languages.
Students: Added information for Saori.
Added more Thai and Chinese Translations (Thanks Blue-Roar & TKRotund).
Added Thai language support.
Crafting: Show drop quantity ranges on crafting node items.
Students: Fixed incorrect Enhanced+ Skill on Nonomi (Swimsuit).

New feature: Ability to track students in your collection. Schale DB will remember the level, stars, equipment and relationship that you set for each student that you add to your collection. Once you add a student to your collection, you can filter students by owned / not owned.

Added ability to import and export your student collection to transfer to another person or browser. Also supports importing data from Justin163's Resource Planner (Go to Transfer > Export to get the data string you can import)
Added More Simplified Chinese translations (Blue-Roar)
Added Simplified Chinese language support. (Huge thanks to Blue-Roar for providing these.)
Crafting: Added English translations for new craft nodes.
Improved font display for Korean and Chinese languages.
Stages: Added information for the event conquest map Lost Paradise Resort Archipelago.
Various bug fixes and optimizations.
Students: Added information for student's favorite items.
Students: Added SSR gifts to favorite gifts list.
Crafting: Added drop information for 3rd tier crafting nodes.
Students: Added information for Hoshino, Shizuko, Izuna and Chise (Swimsuit).
Stages: Added information for Scrimmage D
Items: Added new items and furniture from the latest JP event update.
Raids: Added season point rewards for Total Assault bosses.
Several bug fixes.
Added student skill descriptions for Chinese.
Fixed an issue where some item descriptions would not display correctly in Chinese.
Improved handling of updates - Schale DB will now refresh automatically when there is an updated version available.
